_sText:
Place .BSP file into username/cunter-strike source/maps
I also take no credit in the creation of this map, all credit goes to the original creator.


Traps have been fixed, pictures to see what i have done.



TRAPS
1. Steam Trap: Added a invisible block above the vent that breaks on button, so that the "trigger_push" pushes you up no matter what, I also added larger walls all around so no wall glitching :).



2. Explosion: The trap where there is an explosion in the  air actually does a good amount of damage



3. Slow Steam: The steam now slows you only a bit, now you actually can press the button without people getting angry... It only now slows you slightly basically so t's don't have to react fast.



4. Fire: The fire trap had a glitch where you can walk far on the side and no get hurt ( PICTURE INCLUDED - IN HAMMER EDITOR ) I have now added a "trigger_hurt" so i don't have to change the flame, i also made the "trigger_hurt" built up damage so it acts like fire.


5. I have fixed NOOB event where the T doesn't get sent to the area, i have added a teleport and it now works fine 



I haven't changed this map in any other way other than just fixing it up fully.


PLEASE GIVE ME FEEDBACK AND COMMENT :))
